Bocca said India has a “very ambitious plan” and is already achieving some of the key milestones “even earlier than planned,” pointing to India’s progress in building renewable capacity and expanding electricity infrastructure.

A new update improves how the AI searches and references your chat history, making it easier to pull details from older conversations without manual digging. The feature is rolling out to Plus and Pro users, bringing more continuity to long-term use.

Croma’s Republic Day Sale 2026 runs till January 26 with discounts on smartphones, laptops, TVs and appliances, including iPhone 17 offers and bank-backed exchange benefits.

While the details largely mirror earlier leaks, the consistency across reports suggests Apple’s foldable plans are no longer theoretical. If the timeline holds, 2026 could finally be the year Apple enters the foldable phone market.

Elon Musk has warned of explosive revelations as his lawsuit against OpenAI heads to trial, reigniting a public feud with CEO Sam Altman over the company’s shift from its non-profit roots.

Vivo X200T is expected to launch in India soon with flagship specs, including a Dimensity 9400+ chip, Zeiss cameras, a 6,200mAh battery and premium pricing. Here’s everything we know.

Rather than chasing raw benchmark numbers alone, the company appears focused on delivering flagship-grade performance, gaming, and on-device AI to phones that do not carry eye-watering price tags.

Elon Musk’s xAI is hiring native Hindi and Bengali speakers to train Grok AI and make the chatbot sound more local, as global AI firms step up their India focus.

Microsoft’s January 2026 security update for Windows 11 has introduced an odd and frustrating bug for a small subset of users. Instead of shutting down or entering hibernation, affected systems simply restart.

ChatGPT medical advice turns dangerous after an AIIMS patient suffers internal bleeding. Doctors issue a stark warning against using AI chatbots for diagnosis or self-treatment.

This laptop is built for students, self-learners, first-time coders, budget-conscious buyers, freelancers with light workloads, early professionals who don’t need heavy local processing, and parents buying a first laptop for their child.

Realme has started teasing the launch of its upcoming P4 Power smartphone, hinting at a massive five-digit battery capacity. While the company is yet to reveal its full specifications, early hints suggest that it could house a 10,000 mAh battery.

Lava has confirmed the India launch date of its next smartphone, the Blaze Duo 3. The phone has also been listed on Amazon, confirming its key specifications and full design

Gmail for Android may soon close one of its longest-standing feature gaps. A new report suggests Google is testing the ability to create, edit, and delete custom labels directly within the Android app, bringing it in line with Gmail on iPhone, iPad, and the desktop.

Amazon and Flipkart’s Republic Day sales bring discounts of up to 58% on geysers from Crompton, AO Smith, Havells, Orient Electric, and Haier, with prices starting under Rs 3,500.

Motorola Signature made its global debut last week and is now confirmed to launch in India soon. The phone is confirmed to house an ultra-slim body, powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC and a 5,200mAh battery.

Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff has recalled that the idea for founding the company emerged during a swim with dolphins in Hawaii, a moment he later acted on by quitting Oracle.

OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has confirmed that advertisements will soon begin appearing in ChatGPT as part of a limited testing phase for free users and those on the Go plan.

The claim centres on allegations that OpenAI abandoned its non-profit mission and misled Elon Musk, one of its co-founders, while partnering closely with Microsoft.

A new leak claims Samsung Display has already begun mass production of advanced OLED panels said to be destined for Apple’s pro laptops, potentially signalling a faster-than-anticipated shift away from mini-LED displays.

Google has filed an appeal against a US federal court ruling that found it held an illegal monopoly in online search, setting the stage for a prolonged legal battle that could delay remedies imposed on the company.

In a quarter where the larger business grew at a measured pace, AI clearly behaved like a different engine.
